messages.subject: Presidential Candidates, & Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Tony wrote:  as a way of telling what the two parties, and the two Presidential nominees, stand for. I would also urge you to consider that there are more than
messages.messageBody:
Tony wrote:  as a way of telling what the two parties, and the
two Presidential nominees, stand for.

I would also urge you to consider that there are more than two parties. There is the Green Party, and for the future of the country, and the health of the Earth to look into alternatives to our present political atrocity.  Ralph Nader & LaDuke are a wise choice. Look into it, and Demand they be covered by your local news. Get the word out. If anyone knows, Homeschoolers know....there is more than just one, old way to do things....there is a new creative & healthy way...we just have to find it.  M*  www.votenader.com 
Michelle, Dana & Zain Harper
The Great NorthWest Washington
Legendary Tree & Landscape
